text: Blood and Steel, also known as Condemened Patrol, is a 1959 American World War II drama movie directed by Bernard L. Kowalski and starring John Lupton, James Edwards, Brett Halsey, Ziva Rodann, James Hong. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:World War II movies
title: Blood and Steel
